alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 27 at 6:18AM AKST until November 30 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...North to northeast winds at 35 to 45 mph with possible gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway, Haines Borough and Klukwan and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very strong winds are expected to develop starting late Monday evening as Arctic high pressure strengthens over the Yukon and British Columbia, and a low pressure system moves south over the eastern Gulf of Alaska. Areas where the highest winds are possible include Skagway and Downtown Juneau where 75 mph wind gusts are being forecasted by Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
